channel.title: philstar.com - RSS Headlines
channel.description: Philippine News for the Filipino Global Community

item.title: PDP-Laban faction names Pacquiao standard-bearer for 2022 polls
item.description: The Commission on Elections has yet to decide on which of the two feuding factions of the PDP-Laban is legitimate and which slate will be the official one of the administration party.

item.title: Homicide rap for cop who 'jokingly' drew gun, actually killed pal
item.description: "While they were waiting outside the barangay hall, Ferrer allegedly toyed with his firearm in front of victim Jason Capistrano. It went off and hit Capistrano," Eleazar's statement read.

item.title: DOH logs 19,271 new COVID-19 cases, two labs without data
item.description: It has been 551 days since the first enhanced community quarantine was hoisted over some parts of Luzon, good for the world's longest quarantine.

item.title: Vaccine inequity, cost of quarantine may keep Global South activists out of COP26
item.author: Gaea Katreena Cabico
item.description: Vaccine inequity, prohibitive quarantine requirements, and health risks make it difficult to achieve the United Kingdom’s vision for a “normal and inclusive” COP26 climate summit due to take place from October 31 to November 12 in Glasgow, climate activists said.

item.title: Shorter quarantine for fully vaccinated travelers from North America urged
item.description: An adviser of President Rodrigo Duterte called on the pandemic task force to implement shorter quarantine period for fully vaccinated travelers from North America.

item.title: COVID-19 deniers, anti-vaccine protesters get 'warning' from PNP chief
item.author: Franco Luna
item.description: "Holding protest actions to insist on what you believe in does not make it right. It is but plain and simple acts of defiance and irresponsibility because you are putting our personnel and other civilian population at risk of being infected," he added.

item.title: COA, Ombudsman urged: Probe PS-DBM deals with Pharmally
item.description: "They have the power to view and examine the documents individually," Drilon said.

item.title: Former Social Welfare Secretary Dinky Soliman, 68
item.description: Former Social Welfare Secretary Corazon "Dinky" Soliman died Sunday. She was 68.

item.title: COVID-19 positive individuals can’t vote – Comelec
item.author: Robertzon Ramirez
item.description: Voters testing positive for COVID-19 and still completing isolation will not be allowed by the Commission on Elections (Comelec) to cast their ballots in the May 9, 2022 national and local elections.

item.title: Bill seeks increased benefits for HCWs
item.author: Edu Punay
item.description: A measure seeking to increase the government’s grant of hazard pay and other benefits for healthcare workers has been filed in the House of Representatives.
